# Novelty Report
## Background
Solid‑state lithium‑sulfur batteries are limited by electrolyte conductivity and chemical stability.

## Identified Gaps
Existing patents (US20230012345A1, US20220098765A1) report conductivities up to 10 mS cm⁻¹ and do not disclose protective coatings that prevent degradation.

## Distinguishing Features
- Proprietary sulfide composition achieving >12 mS cm⁻¹ at 25 °C.
- Unique protective coating that significantly enhances chemical stability.
